answers.answer: I definitely did but the only thing I could do was let it wear off on its own...all that sugar at once is not fun
Its been 4 hours since i left and i still feel horrible blah. How were your results? Also, did you feel sick during the test?
Drink water. Try and go for a walk. I felt crappy with everything sugar and too many carbs until I was diagnosed and learned to manage it. Good luck
Thanks i feel better now. That drink was disgusting. I haven't felt bad at all during my pregnancy until this test.

Oh my lord, my three hour test was HORRIBLE! I ended up leaving because I couldnt stop puking it up, I was weak and dizzy and felt faint! My doctor ordered a little bit easier test, I just had to fast then go get blood drawn then go eat a big breakfast and go back two hours later. Definitely easier lol I for sure thought I had gestational diabetes after trying that three hour one, but I passed! :-) so good luck hopefully your test results come back normal :-)
Thanks joanie, that gives me some hope. Oh my test was just look yours. I stuck it out though, they kept asking me did you puke did you puke im like STOP ASKING OR I WILL!
I felt like such crap the entire day after my 3 hour test I drank lots of water and took a nice long nap but it didn't pass till I finally had dinner
Oh my I felt sick adter just the hour test..I'm not big on sugar and oh my that was too much for me. I just kept drinking water.
Yeah that test completely threw me off. Diarrhea for 2 days ... Horrible ill never do kt again
I felt awful most the day just after the one hour one! More sick then throughout my entire pregnancy!!! Glad that part is over

question: Did anyone else feel disgusting for the remainder of the day after taking the 3 hour glucose test or is it just me? I feel uncomfortable, nauseas and dizzy. Anyway to shake this feeling?
title: sick after 3 hr glucose test
